casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
QUALITY AUTO REPAIR. No. 487P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Andrew R. Boyd, for Quality Auto Repair.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of February 2007 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Rehearing":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
